name: Super Star Path
description:
puzzle meets space shoot'em up action! Hop into your spaceship, open a path through huge waves of aliens and other hazards, and face intense boss battles!FEATURES
  • Three difficulty modes.
  • Randomized color puzzle stages.
  • Intense shoot'em up boss fights.
  • Unlock, buy and upgrade new ships.
  • Unlockable Boss Rush mode.
  • Colorful and polished pixel art graphics.
  • Arcade-like FM synth soundtrack.
CREDITS
A game by DYA Games.
